title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 397 - Niagara Frontier State Park, Recreation And Historic Preservation Commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 397 - Niagara Frontier State Park, Recreation And Historic Preservation Commission

State Regulations
§ 397.1 - Territorial scope
§ 397.2 - Vehicle speed limits
§ 397.3 - Use of parkways by recreational and commercial vehicles
§ 397.4 - Hunting and trapping (Repealed)
§ 397.5 - Fishing
§ 397.6 - Possession of pets (Repealed)
§ 397.7 - Repealed
§ 397.8 to 397.10 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 397

Statutory authority: Parks, Recreation and Historic

Preservation Law, §§3.09[8], 7.11[2]; Vehicle and Traffic Law, §
1630[3]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
